entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 10:52 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.5°C
Wind: NNW 35 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending this evening. Clearing this evening. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
